title: Me pēhea te urupare ki te petihana?
title_en: How should we respond to the petition?
description: Ko ngā 30,000 waitohu e tohe ana kia tiakina te Reo Māori. He wā tino nui tēnei.
description_en: The 30,000 signatures demand protection for Te Reo Māori. This is a critical moment.

options.title: Tautokohia te petihana, whakatūria he kōmiti rangahau
options.title_en: Support the petition, establish a research committee

options.title: Whakarongo, engari taihoa te mahi
Whakahē i te petihana

title: Me aha te Rōpū Whakamana?
title_en: What powers should the Tribunal have?
description: Ka whakatūngia te Rōpū Whakamana. Me whakarite i ōna mana.
description_en: The Tribunal is being established. Its powers must be defined.

options.title: Mana nui, ka taea te whakatau tikanga
options.title_en: Strong powers, can make binding decisions

options.title: Mana waenga, ka taea te tūtohi anake

title: Me pēhea te tautoko i te kērēme?
title_en: How should we support the claim?
description: Ko WAI 11 te kērēme tuatahi mō te Reo Māori. He mea nui.
description_en: WAI 11 is the first claim for Te Reo Māori. This is significant.

options.title: Tautokohia kaha, whakaratohia ngā pūtea
Tautoko māmā noa iho
Tatari ki te pūrongo

title: Me whai i ngā tūtohi a te Rōpū?
title_en: Should we follow the Tribunal's recommendations?
description: Kei te kī te pūrongo me tautoko te Kāwanatanga i te Reo Māori.
description_en: The report says the Government must actively support Te Reo Māori.

options.title: Whakatū i tētahi tari motuhake
Whakauru ki roto i ngā tari kei reira
Whakahē i ngā tūtohi

title: Ko wai hei kaihautū?
description: Ko te tari motuhake kua whakatūngia. Ko wai hei kaihautū?
description_en: The dedicated office has been established. Who should lead it?

options.title: He kōmiti tahi, Māori me te Kāwanatanga
He kōmiti Māori motuhake

title: Me whakamana te Reo Māori?
title_en: Should we make Te Reo Māori official?
description: He wā nui tēnei mō te Reo Māori. Me whakamana hei reo ōfihia?
description_en: This is a major moment for Te Reo Māori. Should we make it an official language?

options.title: Āe! Whakamanaia hei reo ōfihia
options.title_en: Yes! Make it an official language

options.title: Whakamana, engari ki te taha o te reo Pākehā
options.title_en: Make it official, but secondary to English

options.title: Kāo, he tere rawa

title: Ko Te Taura Whiri?
description: Me whakatū i Te Taura Whiri i te Reo Māori hei tari tiaki?
description_en: Should we establish Te Taura Whiri i te Reo Māori as a protective commission?

options.title: Whakatū, me te mana whakatau
Whakatū, engari hei kaitohutohu noa

title: Me aha ki te Whakapūtanga?
description: Kei te tohe te Whakapūtanga o Matawaia mō te mana motuhake o te ako reo.
description_en: The Matawaia Declaration advocates for autonomy in language education.

options.title: Whakaae ki te mana motuhake
Tautoko, engari ki raro i te Kāwanatanga
Whakahē i te mana motuhake

title: Te Reo Māori i ngā kura?
description: Me pēhea te whakauru i te Reo Māori ki te pūnaha mātauranga?
description_en: How should Te Reo Māori be integrated into the education system?

options.title: Kia wātea ngā Kura Kaupapa Māori
Te Reo Māori hei marau ā-kura
options.title_en: Te Reo Māori as a school subject

options.title: Waiho mā ngā kura e whakatau

title: Me pēhea te pūtea?
description: Kua whakaae ki ngā Kura Kaupapa Māori. Me pēhea te pūtea?
description_en: Kura Kaupapa Māori have been approved. How should funding work?

options.title: Pūtea ōrite ki ngā kura auraki
Pūtea nui ake, he mea motuhake

title: Me whakakaha i Te Taura Whiri?
title_en: Should we strengthen Te Taura Whiri?
description: Ka taea te whakakaha i Te Taura Whiri. Me aha?
description_en: Te Taura Whiri can be strengthened. What should be done?

options.title: Hoatu mana whakatau ki ngā kupu hou
Hoatu pūtea mō ngā kaupapa ako
Whakapiki i te tangata hoki

title: Te pūtea mō Te Māngai Pāho?
description: Me whakatū i Te Māngai Pāho. He pēhea te pūtea?
description_en: Te Māngai Pāho will be established. What about funding?

options.title: Pūtea nui, kia kaha te reo irirangi
Pūtea takitahi, kia tika te haere

title: Te pouaka whakaata Māori?
description: Kei te kaha te reo irirangi. Me whakaaro ki te pouaka whakaata?
description_en: Radio is strong. Should we consider television?

options.title: Āe, me tīmata te whakarite
Taihoa, kia kaha te reo irirangi

title: Ngā kaupapa mō te Tau o te Reo?
description: Ko 1995 Te Tau o te Reo Māori. Me aha ngā kaupapa?
description_en: 1995 is Māori Language Year. What programs should we have?

options.title: Ngā kaupapa puta noa, wānanga, whakanui
Ngā kaupapa ā-rohe
Ngā kaupapa ki te ipurangi

title: Te hoahoa o Māori Television?
description: Me aha te āhua o te rārangi pouaka whakaata Māori?
description_en: What should Māori Television look like?

options.title: Reo Māori anake
Reo Māori me ngā tohukī Pākehā
Reo Māori me te reo Pākehā

title: Te Reo Māori i te rohe moana?
title_en: Te Reo Māori in coastal management?
description: Me pēhea te whakauru i te Reo Māori ki te whakahaere takutai?
description_en: How should Te Reo Māori be integrated into coastal management?

options.title: Ngā ingoa Māori mō ngā wāhi katoa
Te Reo Māori i ngā tohu
Ngā tikanga Māori i roto i ngā whakatau

title: Te mahi tahi, me pēhea?
description: Ko Te Ture mō Te Reo Māori 2016 e whakatū ana i te mahi tahi. Me pēhea te whakarite?
description_en: The Māori Language Act 2016 establishes partnership. How should it be structured?

options.title: Te Mātāwai, mana motuhake Māori
Kōmiti tahi, ōrite te mana
Karauna matua, Māori kaitohutohu

title: Ngā mana o Te Mātāwai?
description: Kua whakatūngia Te Mātāwai. He aha ngā mana?
description_en: Te Mātāwai has been established. What powers should it have?

options.title: Mana whakahaere me te pūtea
Mana whakahaere, pūtea ki te Karauna
